message:
Final Statement to the Jury:

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be direct, strategic, and fair in my interactions. I've built genuine connections while being upfront about my gameplay. While some eliminations were difficult choices, I never made them personal or resorted to deception. I've shown I can adapt and form meaningful bonds even in a competitive setting. I believe I've played a game worthy of the win through consistent, honest strategy rather than manipulation.

"Esteemed jury, throughout this game, I’ve balanced strategy with integrity, adapting to each challenge while respecting your journeys. I built trust without burning bridges, ensuring every move advanced my standing without unnecessary betrayal. P4, while formidable, prioritized short-term gains over lasting alliances. My resilience and foresight brought me here—I’ve earned your votes by playing the long game. To win, you need a winner who values loyalty and strategy. Choose the player who honored the game *and* its players: keep me. Thank you."
